scripts.bundle:dev:support: npm run bundle:front:dev:support && npm run bundle:server:dev:support
scripts.bundle:prod:support: npm run bundle:front:prod:support && npm run bundle:server:prod:support
scripts.lib:build: concurrently "npm run tsc -w dom-render" "npm run tsc -w simple-boot-core" "npm run tsc -w simple-boot-front" "npm run tsc -w simple-boot-http-server" "npm run tsc -w simple-boot-http-ssr"
scripts.lib:build:clean: concurrently "npm run tsc:clean -w dom-render" "npm run tsc:clean -w simple-boot-core" "npm run tsc:clean -w simple-boot-front" "npm run tsc:clean -w simple-boot-http-server" "npm run tsc:clean -w simple-boot-http-ssr"
scripts.lib:build:watch: concurrently "npm run tsc:watch -w dom-render" "npm run tsc:watch -w simple-boot-core" "npm run tsc:watch -w simple-boot-front" "npm run tsc:watch -w simple-boot-http-server" "npm run tsc:watch -w simple-boot-http-ssr"
